---

title: "Create a ring group"

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create a ring group"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/ring-groups"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new ring group asynchronously. Returns an operation object to track the creation progress.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"X-Request-Id","in":"header","description":"Optional request identifier for tracking","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/vnd.ringgroups.v1+json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"Unique ID of the ring group","example":"aeP9pOoDRbq8_KKiwtsXhQ","readOnly":true,"nullable":true},"allowLogInLogOut":{"type":"boolean","description":"Controls whether members are permitted to log in and out of the ring group. If false members are logged in by default","example":true,"nullable":true},"callerIdEnabled":{"type":"boolean","description":"Controls whether members are permitted to use the ring group's phone number as their external caller ID number","example":true,"nullable":true},"customerId":{"type":"string","description":"Unique ID of the customer account","example":"0012J00042NkZQIQA3","nullable":true},"extensionNumber":{"type":"string","description":"Internal short extension number assigned to the ring group","example":"1001","nullable":true},"forwardingRules":{"type":"array","description":"List of forwarding rules for the ring group. Ring groups support only basic type rules","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"condition":{"type":"string","enum":["UNCONDITIONALLY","BUSY","NO_ANSWER","OUTAGE"],"description":"The condition in which this rule should be applied","example":"UNCONDITIONALLY"},"enabled":{"type":"boolean","description":"Controls whether the rule is active or not","example":true},"destinations":{"type":"array","description":"List of forwarding destinations. BASIC type rules can only have on destination","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"destination":{"type":"string","description":"Number the forwarding rule should forward the call to. Can be either an internal extension number whcy type = EXTENSION_NUMBER or an external number in E.164 format with leading + when type = EXTERNAL_NUMBER","example":"1001, +14085551234","nullable":true},"type":{"type":"string","enum":["AUTO_ATTENDANT","EXTENSION_NUMBER","EXTERNAL_NUMBER","VOICEMAIL","DROP_CALL"],"description":"Determines the type of destination","example":"EXTENSION_NUMBER","nullable":true}},"title":"ForwardingRuleDestination"},"nullable":true}},"required":["condition","enabled"],"title":"ForwardingRule"},"nullable":true},"inboundCallerIdFormat":{"type":"string","enum":["RGNAME_CALLERNUMBER","CALLERNAME_CALLERNUMBER","RGNAME_RGEXTENSION","RGNAME_DIALEDNUMBER"],"description":"Determines what caller ID information is shown when inbound calls are received through this ring group","example":"RGNAME_CALLERNUMBER"},"members":{"type":"array","description":"List of members in the ring group","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"extensionId":{"type":"string","description":"Unique ID of the member user's extension","example":"7yKxifh1SLuDcqQO4501jA","nullable":true},"extensionNumber":{"type":"string","description":"The internal extension number of the member user","example":"1001","nullable":true},"loggedIn":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates whether the member is currently logged in","example":true,"nullable":true},"firstName":{"type":"string","description":"The first name of the member user","example":"Jane","nullable":true},"lastName":{"type":"string","description":"The last name of the member user","example":"Doe","nullable":true},"sequenceNumber":{"type":"integer","description":"Determines the order that members are alerted in for ROUND_ROBIN and SEQUENTIAL ring patterns","example":1,"nullable":true},"userId":{"type":"string","description":"Unique ID of the member user","example":"hvOB1l3zDCaDAwp9tNLzZA","nullable":true},"voicemailAccessEnabled":{"type":"boolean","description":"Controls whether the member can access the ring group's voicemail","example":false,"nullable":true}},"title":"Member"},"nullable":true},"name":{"type":"string","description":"Ring group name","example":"Main Reception","minLength":2,"maxLength":64},"notifyIfBusy":{"type":"boolean","description":"Controls whether the ring group should alert members even if they are on another call","example":true,"nullable":true},"numberOfCycles":{"type":"integer","description":"The number of times the system cycles through all queue members before the call forwarding rule is applied. Applicable only to ROUND_ROBIN and SEQUENTIAL ring patterns.","example":1,"nullable":true},"phoneNumbers":{"type":"array","description":"List of phone numbers assigned to the ring group","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"origin":{"type":"string","description":"Origin or source system of the phone number","example":"CLAIMED","nullable":true},"phoneNumber":{"type":"string","description":"E.164-formatted phone number assigned to the ring group","example":"+14085551234","nullable":true},"portingNumber":{"type":"object","properties":{"phoneNumber":{"type":"string","description":"The number which will replace this ring group phone number when the porting process completes","example":"+14085556789","nullable":true}},"title":"PortingNumber"},"primary":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates whether the number is the primary phone number for the ring group. The primary number will the originator of any calls forwarded to external numbers","example":true,"nullable":true}},"title":"PhoneNumber"},"nullable":true},"ringPattern":{"type":"string","enum":["ROUND_ROBIN","SEQUENTIAL","SIMULTANEOUS"],"description":"Determines how the ring group attempts to alert members. ROUND_ROBIN starts with the member who was alerted last on the previous call to ensure even distribution of calls. SEQUENTIAL starts with the same member on each new call. SIMULTANEOUS alerts all members at the same time","example":"ROUND_ROBIN"},"ringTimeout":{"type":"integer","description":"Duration, in seconds, that each queue member's device rings before the system advances to the next member or triggers the call forwarding rule.","example":15},"site":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"Unique ID of the ring group's site","example":"SAH3U8guQaK4WQhpDZi0rQ","nullable":true},"name":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the ring group's site","example":"Headquarters","nullable":true},"pbxId":{"type":"string","description":"Unique ID of the PBX on which the ring group's site resides","example":"vhaxJhIvR6Ge9kweXeGfBA","nullable":true},"pbxName":{"type":"string","description":"Unique code name of the PBX on which the ring group's site resides","example":"corpco01","nullable":true}},"title":"Site"},"voicemailSettings":{"type":"object","properties":{"accessPin":{"type":"string","description":"The PIN that protects access to the ring group's voicemail. For security reasons can be set/reset but not retrieved","minLength":6,"maxLength":15,"example":"779643634","nullable":true},"notificationEmail":{"type":"string","description":"Email address to send voicemail notifications to depending on notificationType setting. Must be provided if notificationType is anything other than DISABLE","example":"jane.doe@corp.com","nullable":true},"notificationAction":{"type":"string","enum":["ATTACH_DELETE_ORIG","DISABLE","ATTACH_ONLY","NOTIFY_ONLY"],"description":"Determines whether and how voicemail notifications are sent.","example":"NOTIFY_ONLY","nullable":true}},"title":"VoicemailSettings"}},"required":["inboundCallerIdFormat","name","ringPattern","ringTimeout"],"title":"RingGroup"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
